scripts.lint: npm -w ext -w kit -w dropcap -w epos -w epos-spec -w epos-unit -w paralayer -w vite-plugin-rebundle run lint
scripts.reinstall: rm -f package-lock.json && find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && npm install
scripts.release:all: npm run release:epos &&  npm run release:epos-spec && npm run release:epos-unit && npm run release:dropcap && npm run release:paralayer && npm run release:rebundle
